participant_1.background:
I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
my mother has 500 pairs of shoes.
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
i am a librarian in my current job.

participant_2.background:
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
i love to cook ethnic foods.
I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself.
I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!
I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
Hi, I am doing great, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! I am doing well too. I am a librarian and I love to run. What do you do for fun?
I love to read, watch Jimmy Fallon, and cheer on the Raptors. I'm also from Scandinavia where my Viking ancestors are from.
That's really cool! I've never been to Scandinavia, but I've heard it's beautiful. I'm not much of a sports fan, but I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction and mysteries. I'm currently reading a book about the Vikings and I'm really enjoying it.
That sounds really interesting! I've never read a book about the Vikings before. Maybe I'll check it out.
You should! It's really good. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is To Kill a Mockingbird. I love the way it explores the themes of racism and justice.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times and I always find something new to appreciate.
Me too! It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and it always feels new.
I agree! Well, it was nice talking to you. I have to go now, but I hope you have a great day!
You too! It was nice talking to you too
